MLX: array framework for machine learning on Apple silicon

Related repos

  • Fine-tunes LLMs on Apple silicon
  • LLM training framework for Apple Silicon
  • mlx-examples has code for text, image, audio, and multimodal ML models using the MLX framework
  • Machine learning lessons and projects for beginners using Scikit-learn
  • fast vision-language model for on-device AI
  • Tutorials for building AI applications with vector databases
  • run vision and audio language models on your Mac with MLX
  • Machine learning library for portfolio managers and traders
  • ML algorithms from scratch in Jupyter Notebooks with visualizations
